## Tidy data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

### pivot_longer

```{r}
dogs <- data.frame(dog_name = c("Cupcake", "Fliak"),week_1 = c(20, 17), week_2 = c(21, 30), week_3 = c(24, 40))

  
```

```{r}
# --- make data tidy
dogs_longer <- dogs %>%
  tidyr::pivot_longer(week_1:week_3, 
                      names_to = "week",
                      values_to = "miles")
```

```{r}
starwars_split <- starwars %>% 
  separate(col = name,

           sep = " ")
```
